'''Ian Gelder''' (born 3 June 1949) is a British actor. He has a long career in television, including roles in series such as ''[[wikipedia:London's Burning|London's Burning]]'', ''[[wikipedia:Agatha Christie's Poirot|Agatha Christie's Poirot]]'' and the [[wikipedia:Chris Morris (satirist)|Chris Morris]] productions ''[[wikipedia:The Day Today|The Day Today]]'' and ''[[wikipedia:Brass Eye|Brass Eye]]''. He is best-known recently for playing Mr. Dekker in ''[[wikipedia:Children of Earth|Torchwood: Children of Earth]]''.

In ''[[Game of Thrones]]'' Gelder plays Ser [[Kevan Lannister]], younger brother to [[Tywin Lannister]]. He was confirmed in the role on 5 November 2010.
